de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.io
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.io.Configuration

public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

Loads a Properties object for a specified property file.
Implemented as a singleton.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String defaultPropPath
          The default path to the configuration file if it isn't explicitly specified.

getInstance

public static Configuration getInstance(java.lang.String configFileName)
Returns an instance of Configuration for the specified file name.
Singleton implementation to make sure that the logfile isn't opened multiple times.

Parameters:
configFileName - Path to the config file.
Returns:
Instance of Configuration.

getAcRRunner

public java.util.List<Runner> getAcRRunner()
Loads the list of ACR-Systems which should be tested and returns this list as a list of Runner-Classes.

Returns:
List of Runner classes, ready to be executed.

getStackingClassifiers

public java.lang.String[] getStackingClassifiers()
Gets the multiple classifiers for stacking.

Returns:
Array of classifiers in string format.

getFeatureFilter

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFeatureFilter()
Returns a list of FeatureExtractors containing the features which will be used to sort out irrelevant CoreferencePairs.

Returns:
List of Strings representing the features by which the CoreferencePairs are filtered.
